content:
PeerInvitationResponseType Enum

Definition

Specifies the responses a local peer can receive from an application driven collaboration invitation requests.

In this Article

public enum PeerInvitationResponseType
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
Enum
PeerInvitationResponseType

Fields

Accepted

The peer accepted the invitation request.
Declined

The peer declined the invitation request.
Expired

The invitation request has expired.
